reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: India Prosperity Fund Programme - Ease of Doing Business

description.narrative: Support to the ease of doing business strand of the India Prosperity Fund Programme. This programme is designed to support India’s economic modernisation through increasing productivity and facilitating increased sustainable economic growth. As a secondary benefit, the programme will aim to increase opportunities for international business, including for the UK, in areas where the UK is well placed to compete.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
